title: Output Schema for read Operation
description: Output schema for the read operation in the connector.

payload.description: The main response payload from the read operation.

FILE_LAST_MODIFIED_TIME.description: The last modified time of the file.

FILE_IS_DIR.description: Indicates whether the file is a directory.

FILE_PATH.description: The absolute path of the file.

FILE_URL.description: The URL associated with the file.

FILE_NAME.description: The name of the file including its extension.

FILE_NAME_WITHOUT_EXTENSION.description: The name of the file without its extension.

FILE_SIZE.description: The size of the file in bytes.
